descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][size=4]"Do you get to the Cloud District very often? Oh, what am I saying, of course you don't."-Nazeem[/size][/i][/size]
[size=1][s]"Shut up!" "Get out of my way!" "Would you like to try to go to Sovngarde ?"-Dovakin[/s][/size]

His behavior is very rude . But I like him.
So I summon him.

"Summon Nazeem" is a spell can summon Nazeem.
He is burning? Don't care.

He can move 700% of speed.And use dagger in battle.
He will exploded when he die or after a few seconds .
You can summon him to far away.

If you want to blast him soon,let's beat him with some weapons .Then he blast.
...I hated him? No,I like him.

You can get spell tome from tha chest in Whiterun.(Look image.)

*This mod's problem*
-Explosion is too strong.(Giant will die by 6 Nazeem.)
-Effective distance is unclear.
-[s]We don't want to summon him.Because he is "Nazeem".[/s]
author: akaAka
